posts.title: I tried generalism and I hated it.
posts.image: Requirements of tech roles are ever-changing and it is difficult to keep up.
posts.description: My experience with generalism is related to the speed at which a skill or much-needed expertise can be acquired in tech. Requirements of tech roles are ever-changing and it is difficult to keep up, which is why trying to learn multiple skills with the same amount of time you would use to learn just a few is a bad strategy.
